lectures.noCoursesSelectedMessage: You have no courses selected. Before we can display your timetable, please select your courses.

deadlines.cantload: Can't load deadlines. Please make sure that you are connected to the internet.
deadlines.infoText:
Course-wide Deadline (Projects, Worksheets, Seminar Papers, ...) management.

Added items will be visible for all others members of the course!

Deleting something or mark as done will just happen on your device.

Try it! Deadlines named "Test123" will be deleted periodically.

setup.title: Select Courses
setup.info: Choose the lectures, which you want to see in your timetable. Tap on an Semester to look at the course in it.
